Name: Syndicate Clockwork
Description: A defensive frontline with Clockwork scaling, enabling high-value Syndicate and AD/AP backline carries like Jhin, Draven, and Zeri.
Difficulty description: Requires balancing frontline positioning and backline itemization.

Name: Innovator Flex
Description: A highly flexible Innovator core that adapts between Socialite utility and Striker carries, centered on Jayce and Irelia.
Difficulty description: Requires strong "flex" play and item management.

Name: Chemtech Bruisers
Description: A durable Bruiser frontline amplified by Chemtech and Enforcer control, enabling late-game scaling from Silco, Renata, or Viktor.

Name: Hextech Sivir
Description: A front-to-back AD composition centered on Sivir, using Bruiser durability and Hextech shields to enable sustained Striker damage.

Name: Arcanist Yordles
Description: An AP-focused reroll composition built around Yordle economy and Arcanist spell damage, with flexible Twinshot backline options.
Difficulty description: Economy management via Yordles is forgiving, but correct reroll thresholds and AP itemization still require planning.
